short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current MNC/USD price in your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the current price of MinCoin by putting our little button in your browser toolbar. The button uses btc-e.com to get the latest price of BTC/USD, and mcxnow.com to get the latest MNC/BTC. Together the button is able to display the latest MNC/USD.
